title: Moon 360° Insulated Travel Mugs - Leak Proof Reusable Coffee Cups - Pro Version for Performance & Easy Clean - Leakproof Flask for Hot & Cold Drinks - Fits Car Cup Holders, UK Company (380ml, Black)
features: LEAK PROOF 360° LID: Easy sipping without having to unscrew lid. Simply press the top to open the seal, then sip from any angle; press again to close. When you need to refill, the screw lid keeps each travel cup 100% water-tight. With our FULL MOON Leakproof Guarantee, you can take your hot or cold drinks on any adventure and safely pack them in your bag, without leaks ruining your day.

DESIGNED FOR PERFORMANCE: Want access to piping hot tea/coffee all day long? This thermal flask has been specifically designed to keep drinks hot for longer. With the advanced double-walled vacuum insulation made from the highest grades of 18/8 Stainless Steel.

EASY TO CLEAN: The 360° Lid can be disassembled by hand and placed in the dishwasher. The flask's metal body has a wide mouth opening for a quick and easy hand wash. Every coffee flask is 100% tested to be 100% BPA Free, Lead Free and a great way to reduce the demand for single use coffee cups.

BEST COFFEE MUG FOR CAR: Keep your eyes on the road, not on your Coffee Travel Mug. With a minimalist style to fit all interiors, the narrow base will fit any car cup holder. We finish each coffee cup with a durable powder coat and soft silicon base for extra durability on the go.

GUILT-FREE PURCHASE FROM UK COMPANY: We're a UK-based eco brand, so can charge less for travel cups made from high-grade 18/8 stainless steel. Instead, we offer the best customer service and our FULL MOON lifetime guarantee. Don't chance it on cheaper versions or pay more to cover the costs of a big business. Instead, shoot for the Moon.
